title: Riot can you add the Hero Vengeful Spirit from Dota Please?
body:
You've added so many Champions with troll potential there's no excuse not to bring such a powerful utility based game changer/engage Champion with that massive ranged position reversal that works on allies too.

I think it's a great concept and she was my favourite character in Dota because of the combos she could pull off (Like swapping a Scorpion King in which would be Akin to swapping a Rammus but instead he has a Line dash to Stun and an ultimate that after a second Channel does basically a more damaging smaller AOE Rammus ulti) and I think because of the Leagues dynamics and a lack of such skills and not a lot of Champions with a lack of engage in some manner due to flash being free unlike Dota where you need to buy an item to be able to "flash" she could be easily balanced and add a lot to the League.

well yes and no because dota is just a mod any one can take a idea from it
Yeah but they can just pretend they didn't copy it /cough Ekko /cough.
Ekko wasn't copied from Dota 2 though.

Nerubian Weaver has the exact same ultimate except it doesn't do damage in an AOE when she goes back in time 4 seconds.

All I'm saying is I'd love to be able to play a Champion that can swap allies in and out of battle with a position reverse on cast skill that also works on enemies. I mean it doesn't even have to work on enemies for it to be a cool design it could just be used to swap allies in and out of battle IE Darius (Jump in, bait them to engage then swap positions with him and boom). The Champion could be balanced around that capability (weaknesses based on other situations that mean having that Champion and having them able to do such a strong thing would mean they would have to be squishy or something and maybe have less strength than 50% of Champions or something (balanced).

Yay, more troll plays with switching allies into some retarded position while I get away free.

oh no, were getting chased I'll shove my ally behind while I keep running faster

I'm sorry but thresh's lantern is the best way of transport for me. or bards magical journey.

So make it so that if you hit the #1 Key within 2 seconds it switches you back as a special feature of that Champion.

That way if someone trolls you, you are in control instantly and can deny them their troll.

I know that might mean the potential for more balancing as it might make the Champion more powerful but it'd avoid the trolling potential.

Arrows that slow have been in hundreds of games.

Just like half the skills people say are stolen from Dota - are present in hundreds of different games.

I think a Champion with a swap ability would be sick (but one like Vengeful Spirits, not Urgots swap) as in one that lets you swap with allies as well.
I don't think Riot would add a champion from another game, especially DOTA.
